title: Where is the Starguardian Jinx sale?

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins on sale this April! Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month.

body:
Starguardian jinx was supposed to get an early sale this month. All the sales have been announced up until may 1st with no SG jinx going on sale.

 These early sales are the only time legendarys go on sale so people like me check the news almost daily waiting for them to come out. For them not even to come out?! wtf. That is false advertising. 

I haven't even played LoL in a month or two but you got me checking your news for something that didn't even come out.

replies.body: it is on sale now bruh !! go go go 1350 RP

I know you're stoked to get your hands on Star Guardian Jinx, but April isn't over.  :/  Keep your eyes on the [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) announcements, and hang tight!
